name: Poopy Monkey (AbyWaby)
description:
Poopy Monkey  is a simple game. This is my first game ever, so don't judge me if it is bad. I created this game for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

The Objective is to find all of your babies, and escape the dangerous world of "Poopy Monkey". Collecting babies will make you stay togheter, so the theme "Joined Togheter" is respected. I hope you like the game. 

Controls:

"A" = left

"D" = right

"SPACE" = jump / poop

How To Play:

You are spawned in a weird jungle, as a little monkey. In order to complete the game, you need to find your 2 babies, and get out of the jungle togheter. The more babies you have, the less jump power you have, in order to pass small obstacles. So your babies make you "stronger". Level 1: You are in a Jungle, your jump power is 9. Level 2: You found your first baby and now you are looking for the 2nd in a lonely desert. Your jump power is 8. Level 3: You found your 2nd baby and now you are looking for a way out. You are in Hell. Your jump power is 7.
